xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.1 Kusalapada » 2.3.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
29.
1314Hetusampayutto kusalo dhammo hetusampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
30.
1315Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1316Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1317Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1318(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup2.3.2 Akusalapada >>
